sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-row>
      <b-col v-for="type in typeRamifications" md="6" xl="6" :key="type">
          <label for="nom" class="form-label">{{type.nom}}</label>
          <Select2 v-model="ramification" required :options="typeRamifications.map(item =>({id: item.id, text: item.nom}))"     style="padding: 10"/>


      </b-col>
  </b-row>

</template>
<script>
import Select2 from 'vue3-select2-component';
import Api from "../helpers/api";

export default {
    components:{
        Select2
    },
    data(){
      return{
          user: null,
          api: new Api(),
          fields: [],
          typeRamifications: [],
          ramification: null,
      }
    },

    created() {
        this.user = this.$store.state.currentUser;
        let userEntite = [];
        // let userRamification = [];
        //userRamification = this.user.affectations.filter(item => item.ramification != null && item.enabled === true);

        if (this.user.type.nom !== 'Super Admin'){
            userEntite = this.user.affectations.filter(item => item.entite != null && item.enabled === true);
            this.fields.push({colonne: 'ent.id', operator: 'in', value: userEntite.map(item=> item.id), connector: "and"})

        }

        this.fields.push({colonne: 'tram.enabled', operator: 'eq', value: 1, connector: "and"})
      //  this.fields.push({colonne: 'ram.id', operator: 'in', value: userRamification.map(item=> item.id), connector: "and"})

        this.api.listing("/type_ramifications", this.fields, "tram.ordre", "asc", 1000, 1 )
            .then(response => {
                this.typeRamifications = response.data;
            })

    }

}
</script>
